description:
Lush and flexible, the Antares R3 Versus Evo Saddle blends performance with comfort. Its profile satisfies "Chameleons," riders whose flexibility varies and who alternate between supporting their weight on their sit bones and their soft tissues. The Versus Evo's relief channel makes riding more comfortable by reducing some of the pressure on soft tissues.

  • K:ium rail is light, strong and provides a stiff connection between the shell and the seatpost
  • Carbon-injected nylon shell increases stiffness and power transfer
  • Versus Evo channel is designed to provide comfort in the riding position
  • Comfort Core foam is bonded on the shell to allow for natural movement
name: Fizik Antares R3 Versus EVO Saddle - Unisex
